DOC.brief_title: Prospective Study Safety Efficacy InQu® Bone Graft Extender Lumbar Interbody Fusion Surgery
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study collect on-label safety efficacy data InQu Bone Graft Extender apply transforaminal lumbar interbody fusion ( TLIF ) posterior lumbar interbody fusion ( PLIF ) multiple clinical site . Adverse event , time fusion Patient Reported Outcomes ( PROs ) record 12 month follow-up .
